i18n.key: you have to validate parameters and contents presented below. The ″page parameters″ tab presents the main information related to the name, referencing, page template and publishing dates. ″Page content″ tab displays the content as the internaut will see it, once the page is published. To continue, insert a commentary that will be sent to the page author, and click ″accept″ or ″refuse″ at the top right of this screen.
information of the currently published version
content of the version in production
